<<<<<<< HEAD
The miser a comedy acted by His Majesties servants at the Theater Royal / written by Thomas Shadwell. Shadwell, Thomas, 1642?-1692. Molière, 1622-1673. Avare.
[8], 92, [1] p.
Printed for Hobart Kemp ..., London : 1672.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library. The main plot is almost a translation of Molières L'Avare, but many new characters and scenes have been added. cf. "Reader," 3d prelim. leaf; Miles, Influence of Molier̀e, p. 234.
=======

[8], 92, [1] p.
Printed for Hobart Kemp ..., London : 1672.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library. The main plot is almost a translation of Molières L'Avare, but many new characters and scenes have been added. cf. "Reader," 3d prelim. leaf; Miles, Influence of Molier̀e, p. 234.
